availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Taylor (Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Clerk in Covington, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from June 13, 1861 to November 23, 1861. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from August 15, 1862 to April 22, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 7, p. 909.
